1.9.1.9-1.0.2: Fix /odc add bug with newer versions of MDECore.

1.10.2.1.10.2-1.1: Fix a bug where converted items would become new stacks, quickly filling up the player's inventory.
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.1.1: Update to new mdecore command bugfix.
1.10.2.1.10.2-1.1.2: Fix bug that shifts items around.

1.11.1.11-1.0.1: Fix bug that shifts items around.
1.11.1.11-1.0.2: Fix empty stack crashing the game.

1.12.1.12-1.0.1: Fix a bug that caused items to go missing after adding new conversions.

1.16.3.16.0.0: Updated to 1.16.3 and reset version numbers.

1.16.4.16.1.0: Update to 1.16.4, ignore ores, ingots, and blocks base tag by default.
1.16.4.16.1.2: Fix /odc list not showing item conversions and improve tag blacklist to prevent common misconfiguration issues.
1.16.4.16.1.3: Upgrade the converter block to work with other mod pipes and tubes.
1.16.4.16.1.4: Fix an issue where direct item conversion for source items with no tags would no occur.
1.16.4.16.1.5: Clarify alternative configuration options available when an item has no tags or all tags are blacklisted.
1.16.4.16.1.6: Add additional tags to blacklist to prevent overconversion
1.16.4.16.1.7: Improve saving of conversion config file to always include the comment and to sort alphabetically.
1.16.4.16.1.8: Add /odc set command and update help documentation.
1.16.4.16.1.9: Fixes the converter block not dropping and adds a tooltip the explains how it works.

1.18.2.18.0.2: Adds additional tags to the defaultly ignored tags list.
